kickstart.description: Add Development Appliance Definition to the Frontend
kickstart.changelog: $Log: devel-server.xml,v $ Revision 1.1 2011/03/27 17:27:30 phil Add the development appliance (Imported from 5.4 EC2 Roll)
kickstart.post: /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add appliance devel-server membership="Development Appliance" node=devel-appliance graph=default compute=no public=yes
